title: Plan for Charitable Giving
description: A client wants to donate appreciated stock to a charity to be more tax-efficient.

tasks.description: Identify highly appreciated, long-term holdings in the client's portfolio.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a stock that has significant unrealized capital gains.

tasks.description: Explain the tax benefits of donating appreciated stock directly versus selling it and donating the cash.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains how donating the stock avoids capital gains tax.

tasks.description: Facilitate the transfer of the shares from the client's account to the charity's brokerage account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes the transfer of shares to the designated charity.
